verbs.description: [V: suv] [ARG1: driver hurt in crash that] closes bethlehem route the driver of a sport utility vehicle was badly injured and part of route 9w was closed after the suv collided with a truck hauling heavy equipment police said the crash took place at 11 08 a m near tremay lane in selkirk police said the driver of the ford suv was taken to albany medical center hospital to be treated for a number of injuries route 9w was closed and police said it might take a few hours for the street to reopen the crash remains under investigation it was unclear if the driver of the other truck was injured ford motor company ford bethlehem selkirk albany medical center hospital
